nodes.text: Rebel Storm was the first release of Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Miniatures game. It featured 60 miniature figures, each with corresponding statistics cards, based on the timeline of the original trilogy. This initial set was released on September 3, 2004 and has been reissued several times since then. Miniatures could be purchased with in booster packs of 7 random minis, or a Starter Set which contained 8 random minis, as well as "Luke Skywalker, Rebel," "Darth Vader, Dark Jedi," a rulebook, and a map based on the Death Star.
Rarity denoted as follows: Common (C), Uncommon (U), Rare (R), Very Rare (VR)
Characters are listed in set order

On November 30, 2004, Wizards released Star Wars Miniatures: Ultimate Missions: Rebel Storm, a book with 33 scenarios, as well as extra maps and map tiles (Mos Eisley spaceport and Cloud City), based on the figures from Rebel Storm.
